title: Mystery Skins
body: So its that time where you can open mystery skins yourself. Well i opened two, i got blast zone heimerdinger and samurai yi and im almost on the brink of crying. So can someone tell me some of their bad experiences with mystery skin openings to make me feel better? :)

replies.body: Battle bunny Riven… hate that skin sooooooo fking much when i got it i wanted to rip myself…………
Well it's not that bad of a skin

Not when you now have all riven skins when you didn't want to and i told myself that i would only get arcade and dragon blade and my friend ended up gifting me everyone except bunny. And saw the gifts came out so i got one and it gave me bunny pissed me right off i don't want it on my account :<

I was gifted two Teemo skins in a row, when I gifted my friend the 2nd time he got Super Galaxy Rumble. To make me fell better he gifted me a 3rd...... got another Teemo skin. It was honestly more funny than anything but kind of sucks because I don't play Teemo at all.
hahah guts i guess i took a risk and i had to pay for it :0

got 2 ultimate skins, DJ Sona and Pulsefire Ezreal, in 15 self mystery boxes. Wurf

I accidentally mystery gifted my friend a champion instead of a skin once and he got Olaf who (although he said is good) frickin hates playing. lol
He's gotten him a few times since then in ARAMs too hahaha
My friend once bought 3 mystery gifts, and got three Tryndamere skins- the one champion he already has a skin for, and doesn't play...

Not gifting to myself, but I traded with two different friends and gave them both Championship Thresh, while I got 2 Gragas skins (hillbilly and santa). They both had Thresh as one of their main champs, while I don't play the Fatman at all. We joked about my luck for a good week :). Bad luck, you have to remember with Mystery skin it is RNGesus, sometimes it just isn't in your favor.
i would if i hadnt spent all my rp on mystery skins which were crap :0

yeah but thats i free skin, i spent 490 rp on each mystery skin and they are not really appealing. i couldve bought a 975 rp skin and be more satisfied with the look and stuff
